meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the February 26, 2024 Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Impact of AI in Local Government Permit Review
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the impact of AI technologies in local government permit review processes.
agenda_items.presenter: John Mirkin, Vice President of Corporate Strategy, AutoReview.AI; Sabrina Dugan, Vice President of Research and Development, AutoReview.AI

agenda_items.title: 2023 External Audit Presentation and Discussion
agenda_items.description: Presentation and discussion regarding the findings of the 2023 external audit.
agenda_items.presenter: Sara Dempsey, Partner-In-Charge, Weaver; Jeff Wada, Senior Manager, Weaver

agenda_items.title: Inspector General Division Update
agenda_items.description: Update from the Inspector General regarding ongoing investigations and activities.
agenda_items.presenter: Bart Bevers, Inspector General, City Attorney’s Office

agenda_items.title: Annual Investment Policy Review
agenda_items.description: Review of the annual investment policy as required by city regulations.
agenda_items.presenter: Jenny Kerzman, Assistant Director of Treasury, City Controller’s Office

agenda_items.title: Development Services - Monthly Performance Update & Process Map Improvements
agenda_items.description: Monthly performance update from Development Services and discussion on process map improvements.

agenda_items.title: Review of City Real Estate for Development and Redevelopment Opportunities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on potential development and redevelopment opportunities for city real estate.
